changeSet.author: csteele

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clinlims.site_information WHERE name = 'Data Sub URL'

changeSet.comment: insert value for where data should be submitted to
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO clinlims.site_information (id, name, lastupdated, description, value, encrypted, value_type) VALUES (nextval('clinlims.site_information_seq'), 'Data Sub URL', current_timestamp, 'The url where data is submitted to the VL Dashboard', '', 'false', 'text');
